level.heading: Existing cooperative groups; acceptance of act; filing and recordation of amended articles and bylaws.
level.text: Any group incorporated under another law of the District and operating on a cooperative basis or any unincorporated group operating on such a basis in the District may elect by a vote of 2/3 of the members voting to secure the benefits of and be bound by this chapter, and shall thereupon amend the parts of its articles and bylaws as are not in conformity with this chapter. A certified copy of the amended articles shall be filed with the Mayor.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
